ygData.subject: Re: newbie smithy
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy ore and metal sheets at merchants in freeport.  You could buy rusty weapons from merchants almost anywhere, but I prefer to get them by fishing or
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy ore and metal sheets at merchants in freeport. You could buy
rusty weapons from merchants almost anywhere, but I prefer to get them by
fishing or killing any skeletons or orcs I see carrying one.

>===== Original Message From EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com =====
>From: yur@...
>
>
>
>I have 80 plat in the bank and I have around 60 points saved up at the guild
>master. he offer me smithing so i will take full advantage of it. But i was
>wondering if i can buy metal or ore or whatever at merchants instead of
trying
>to kill rock dervishes for them ?? Can i buy rusty daggers at merchants ?
>
>btw, i am lvl 18 and wouldn't mind camping out newbie zones to get these
ores.
>
>Erudite, Wizard.
>
>Richard Yu - IBM
>
>
>
